scripts.start-server: http-server -a localhost -p 8000 -c-1 --silent & echo '\x1B[1;35m### Server has started on localhost:8000 ###\x1B[0m'
scripts.stop-server: pkill -f 'http-server -a localhost -p 8000' && echo '\x1B[1;35m### Server stopped on localhost:8000 ###\x1B[0m'
scripts.check-server: pgrep -f 'http-server -a localhost -p 8000' 1>/dev/null && echo '\x1B[1;35m### Server is running on localhost:8000 ###\x1B[0m' || echo '\x1B[1;35m### Server is NOT running! ###\x1B[0m'
scripts.test-e2e: pgrep -f 'http-server -a localhost -p 8000' && protractor protractor.conf.js || echo '\x1B[1;35m### Server is not started on port 8000! ###\x1B[0m'
